SEQanswers - 生物信息学https://www.seqanswers.com/下一代测序相关生物信息学的讨论：资源、算法、开源工作等zh 2023 年 10 月 26 日星期四 04:19:20 GMT v公告60图片/misc/rss.png SEQanswers - 生物信息学https://www.seqanswers.com/ Galaxy, how to reverse the step of "Build list of Dataset Pairs"? https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325130-galaxy-how-to-reverse-the-step-of-build-list-of-dataset-pairs Sat, 21 Oct 2023 03:31:50 GMT嗨，我已经构建了一个数据集对列表，然后我发现我使用了一些错误的数据集。我怎样才能逆转这个过程并释放数据...... Hi, all
我已经建立了我的数据集对的列表，然后我发现我使用了一些错误的数据集。如何反转该过程并释放数据对？; 生物信息学szy0931 https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325130-galaxy-how-to-reverse-the-step-of-build-list-of-dataset-pairs 用于单细胞组学的生物信息学软件https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325112-bioinformatics-software-for-single-cell-omics Tue, 17 Oct 2023 03:16:13 GMT我的教授要求我找到一个软件解决方案来处理 scRNA 数据分析（预处理和分析数据）。该部门将... My professor asked me to find a software solution to deal with scRNA data analyses (preprocessing and analyzing data). The department is going to have VIZGEN and COSMX machine coming next quarter. 3-4 labs depend on 1 bioinformatician guy is really annoying and inconvenient.
我正在关注一些公司：
- 生物图灵
- 罗莎琳德
- 细胞基因
大多数时候，我们希望比较元数据类别以产生见解，并对这些类别应用基因集/路径分析。关于这个原因我真的很沮丧有什么建议吗？​; 生物信息学杜伊森9123 https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325112-bioinformatics-software-for-single-cell-omics ONT测序甲基化数据标准化https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325106-ont-sequencing-methylation-data-normalization Sun, 15 Oct 2023 10:25:36 GMT I have methylation data from ONT sequencing expressed as percentage of methylation and/or number of reads. I don't know if I'm supposed to normalize...I have methylation data from ONT sequencing expressed as percentage of methylation and/or number of reads. I don't know if I'm supposed to normalize the data and how to handle replicates. Some ideas: I have data in triplicate. I want to normalize the data (quantile normalization is the preferred option) and/or collapse data to have 1 file/dataset from 3 replicates (doing weighted average maybe). So 1 idea would be just to perform weighted average of each methylation value doing [%M*NR] where %M is the percentage of methylated reads and NR is number of reads, per each methylated position. In this case I will lose the meaning of the percentage value in the downstream analyses because I will have a weighted value. otherwise I can perform quantile normalization on the number of reads (total and methylated) and then calculate percentage of methylated reads. I would like the opinion of someone with a better statistical background than me 感谢您的帮助！

%M-S1 NR-S1 %M-S2 NR-S2 %M-S3 NR-S3
方法1 20 60 15 54 41 12
方法2 40 14 78 52 13 65
方法3 12 94 73 19 37 70
方法4 36 77 69 14 26 74

; 生物信息学沙鲁斯https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325106-ont-sequencing-methylation-data-normalization 用于聚类单细胞 RNA seq 数据基准测试的数据集https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325097-datasets-for-benchmarking-of-clustering-single-cell-rna-seq-data Tue, 10 Oct 2023 11:31:30 GMT Hello, Recently I've encountered problems with finding sufficiently big and recent single-cell RNA datasets in which cell-type grouping...Hello,

最近，我在寻找足够大且最新的单细胞 RNA 数据集时遇到了问题，其中细胞类型分组（聚类）是用聚类以外的方法准备的。我看到一些研究使用例如 Tabula Muris 数据集，但是将通过某种聚类方法获得的细胞类型标签视为比较不同聚类算法的基本事实完全是无稽之谈。
; 生物信息学奥拉斯22 https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325097-datasets-for-benchmarking-of-clustering-single-cell-rna-seq-data Bowtie2 对准器或 Samtools 错误https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325077-bowtie2-aligner-or-samtools-error Sun, 08 Oct 2023 09:59:10 GMT大家好，我对 NGS 数据分析比较陌生，但是我已经学会了如何分析 RNA-seq 和 CHIP-seq 数据。我已经写了... Hello everyone,
我对 NGS 数据分析相对较新，但我已经设法学习如何分析 RNA-seq 和 CHIP-seq 数据。我已经编写了一些基本的 python 脚本来自动执行这些步骤，并且它们直到最近才开始工作，这意味着我已经获得了结果，例如量化后差异表达分析的 txt 文件或峰值调用的有效文件。我停止使用脚本大约 2 周，因为在那段时间我没有更多数据，当我 3 天前回来并尝试分析来自 GEO 的几组新 sra 文件时，我的每个文件都不断发生相同的错误。我正在尝试分析。基本上，当我尝试将 sam 文件转换为 bam 时，在与 Bowtie2 对齐后立即发生错误，在特定行或不完整的 aux 字段中显示解析错误。任何帮助将不胜感激。如果这种格式不适合提问，我也深表歉意，这是我第一次在论坛上寻求帮助。我提到这些命令是因为当我运行脚本时以及当我在终端中为每个文件手动编写命令时都会发生错误。
命令：bowtie2 -p 6 -x {genome_index_path} -U {fastq-file} -S {output-sam-file}
samtools -b -o {输出-bam-文件} {输出-sam-文件}; 生物信息学转座子https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325077-bowtie2-aligner-or-samtools-error 塔比克斯错误https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325065-tabix-error Tue, 03 Oct 2023 03:33:45 GMT我是新来的。运行 tabix -h ftp://ftp.1000genomes.ebi.ac.uk/vol1/ftp/release/20100804/ALL.2of4intersection.20100804.genotypes.vcf.gz... I am new to this.

跑步

tabix -h ftp://ftp.1000genomes.ebi.ac.uk/vol1...notypes.vcf.gz 2:39967768-39967768

得到一个错误：
[E::hts_open_format] 无法打开文件“ftp://ftp.1000genomes.ebi.ac.uk/vol1/ftp/release/20100804/ALL.2of4intersection.20100804.genotypes.vcf.gz”：协议不支持
无法打开“ftp://ftp.1000genomes.ebi.ac.uk/vol1/ftp/release/20100804/ALL.2of4intersection.20100804.genotypes.vcf.gz”：不支持协议​

但是，wget 文件和 tbi 文件
wget ftp://ftp.1000genomes.ebi.ac.uk/vol1...notypes.vcf.gz
wget ftp://ftp.1000genomes.ebi.ac.uk/vol1...pes.vcf.gz.tbi

和
tabix -h ALL.2of4intersection.20100804.genotypes.vcf.gz 2:39967768-39967768

有用。


我用远程文件对 tabix 做了什么问题？

谢谢！！！; 生物信息学眩晕https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325065-tabix-error 治疗前后数据库https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325047-pre-and-post-treatment-database Thu, 28 Sep 2023 09:49:10 GMT Dear Colleagues, I'm currently looking for RNASeq Studies from Patients from pre and post treatment in any indications on oncology. I found some...Dear Colleagues,

我目前正在寻找针对任何肿瘤学适应症的患者治疗前和治疗后的 RNASeq 研究。
我在 GEO 或纸上找到了一些，但有时患者数量有限。而且，做起来确实很费时间。

你们中有人已经知道一些消息来源了吗？

多谢，

奥利维尔


; 生物信息学奥德尔福尔https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325047-pre-and-post-treatment-database 转录因子共定位 p 值https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325045-transcription-factor-colocalization-p-values Wed, 27 Sep 2023 19:09:48 GMT我有床格式的 TF A 和 TF B 的 ChIPSeq 峰值数据。在基因组浏览器中一起检查这些内容时，我发现有很多情况...... I have ChIPSeq peak data for TF A and TF B in bed format. On examining these in a genome browser together, I see that there are many instances when TFBS for both A and B are close to each other. What kind of statistical test can I do (and how) to check if the two TFs co-localize.

换句话说，如果我有一个实验中的基因组位点列表（我如何获得这些并不重要）并且想要测试这些基因组位点是否始终接近（例如 < 1kb）来自另一组完全独立的基因组基因座。获得这个的最好方法是什么？我也想获得一些有意义的价值。
​; 生物信息学科帕尔杰夫https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325045-transcription-factor-colocalization-p-values
